actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for a separate agency within the Department of Labor to be known as the Veterans' Employment Service, to authorize the appointment of an Assistant Secretary of Labor for Veterans' Employment.

summary.text: Provides for a separate agency within the Department of Labor to be known as the Veterans' Employment Service. Sets for the duties of such Service. Authorizes the appointment of an Assistant Secretary of Labor for Veterans' Employment.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a separate agency within the Department of Labor to be known as the Veterans' Employment Service, to authorize the appointment of an Assistant Secretary of Labor for Veterans' Employment.
